title: We all cri
body:
We are all sad now :C. nearly 3 hours of stacking nasus veig and sion. The one guy surrenders for a laugh... hate him with us plz (╥﹏╥) veig got 6k ap... sion got 9k hp stacks and I got nearly 10k nasus (would have more if we didn't all dc bout 45 min each) but still all that time down the drain....
we are all in {{champion:32}} state now

replies.body: sions W stacks health for every unit he slays

Man i feel you..
Never knew sion stacked though, going to look into how he does!
was a full ad sion with nearly 12k hp
